StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Emporium_Name
StringTable.String: Endless Emporium

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Emporium_Desc
StringTable.String: The faction that runs the Galactic Bazaar. Dedicated to the free exchange of goods regardless of borders or treaties.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Bazaar]Galactic Bazaar[/HS] discount based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] bonus based on the members' [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_EmpathySociety_Name
StringTable.String: Empathy Society

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_EmpathySociety_Desc
StringTable.String: A community dedicated to building a kinder and more thoughtful universe.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] decrease based on the members' [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ScienceGuild_Name
StringTable.String: The Science Team

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ScienceGuild_Desc
StringTable.String: A group dedicated to the research of new things while avoiding larger, bulkier members of their species.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] decrease based on the members' [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ConversionCore_Name
StringTable.String: Conversion Core

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ConversionCore_Desc
StringTable.String: Dedicated to inventing new ways to research and persuade the gullible masses.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] decrease based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ProductionCore_Name
StringTable.String: Production Core

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ProductionCore_Desc
StringTable.String: A group dedicated to the maximizing production no matter the cost.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] decrease based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_MediaAlliance_Name
StringTable.String: The Media Alliance

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_MediaAlliance_Desc
StringTable.String: Here to share our cultural values with the rest of the universe, whether they want it or not.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS] penalty based on the members' [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_SpacingGuild_Name
StringTable.String: Spacing Guild

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_SpacingGuild_Desc
StringTable.String: Secret society of beings seeking to fold space in new ways.[BR][BR]Moves increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] penalty based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_SlaversGuild_Name
StringTable.String: Slaver's Guild

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_SlaversGuild_Desc
StringTable.String: The greatest slave masters in the universe.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].[BR]Maintenance decrease based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_SuperiorityLeague_Name
StringTable.String: Superiority League

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_SuperiorityLeague_Desc
StringTable.String: Culls the weak to allow the strong to thrive.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] penalty based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_CapitalistSociety_Name
StringTable.String: Freemarket Society

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_CapitalistSociety_Desc
StringTable.String: Working to privatize everything. Everything. Even what you're thinking right now.

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Ecologism_Name
StringTable.String: Ecologism

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Ecologism_Desc
StringTable.String: Working together to improve the ecology of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Thrive_Name
StringTable.String: Thrive

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Thrive_Desc
StringTable.String: A deeply spiritual group focused on the here-and-now at the expense of material things.

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_BankingClan_Name
StringTable.String: Banking Clan

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_BankingClan_Desc
StringTable.String: Underwriting everything in the universe to the resentment of all.

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_MiningGuild_Name
StringTable.String: Mining Guild

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_MiningGuild_Desc
StringTable.String: Organization of people who mine the strategic resources for us.[BR][BR]Mining bonus based on the members' [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] decrease based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_WarriorCaste_Name
StringTable.String: Warrior Caste

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_WarriorCaste_Desc
StringTable.String: The secret organization of our greatest warriors.

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Singularity_Name
StringTable.String: Singularity

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Singularity_Desc
StringTable.String: Seeks the technological singularity.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].[BR]Maintenance based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_NaturalLeague_Name
StringTable.String: Natural League

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_NaturalLeague_Desc
StringTable.String: Concerned about the incorporation of cybernetics with the natural state of the species. Supports biological growth and diversity, but requires significant resources to do it.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS] decrease based on the members' [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_FreemindCenter_Name
StringTable.String: Freemind Center

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_FreemindCenter_Desc
StringTable.String: Wants peace and balance in the galaxy.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Tourism]Tourism[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].[BR]Maintenance increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Warforged_Name
StringTable.String: Warforged

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Warforged_Desc
StringTable.String: Prepared for war, even if they need to ignore government regulations to do it.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Military]Military[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS].[BR][HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Precursors_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Heirs

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_Precursors_Desc
StringTable.String: Devoted to the study of the Precursors.[BR][BR]Relic bonus based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].[BR]Maintenance increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ShimmeringDepths_Name
StringTable.String: Shimmering Depths

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ShimmeringDepths_Desc
StringTable.String: Protectors of the depths from which we came

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ChurchOfTheWay_Name
StringTable.String: Church of the Way

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_ChurchOfTheWay_Desc
StringTable.String: Adopting all into our church.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] increase based on the members' [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_CuttersGuild_Name
StringTable.String: Cutter's Guild

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_CuttersGuild_Desc
StringTable.String: A collection of the most powerful criminal organizations
